name: Neovada
tag_list: sms, mms, community, poker, sms-gateway, sportsbetting
overview:
Company based in Oslo focused on web and mobile developement. Operates today 4 major web sites / services in different markets:

Sendega: SMS Gateway service offering businesses a way to send and receive SMS and MMS either by building an SMS application based on the API or used in-built modules for easy deployment.

SMSUtopia.com: Membership service that allows users to send SMS/texts from the internet. The site has today over 90.000 registered users and has so far been used to send over 9 million SMS/texts.

SMSKing.se /.no: SMSKing is a membership service that incorporates social network features in addition to giving its members a service to send texts all over the world. The site has today over 75.000 registered users.

Donkr.com Donkr is an international online community for poker that is developed on behalf of collaborating partners. The site is today operating in 10 different countries and is on the top 20 list of international poker sites. Donkr is also the poker site with the largest growth internationally.
